Class ExamService

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.service.ExamService
public class ExamService extends Object
Service class for managing exam-related operations. Provides functionality for creating, updating, and managing exams, handling questions, student answers, and grading. This class interacts with the database to perform CRUD operations on exam data.

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

      Returns:

      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • autoSubmitExpiredExams

      public void autoSubmitExpiredExams() throws SQLException
      Automatically submits all expired exams. This method should be called periodically to handle unsubmitted exams.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • startExam

      public boolean startExam(int studentId, int examId) throws SQLException
      Starts an exam for a student. Creates a new report entry with 'in_progress' status.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student
      examId - The ID of the exam
      Returns:
      true if exam start successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • autoSubmitExam

      public boolean autoSubmitExam(int studentId, int examId) throws SQLException
      Automatically submits an exam for a student. Used when time expires or system needs to force-submit.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student
      examId - The ID of the exam
      Returns:
      true if auto-submission successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs
